name: CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory.tensorObj_map
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory D
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
X‚úù Y‚úù : C
f : Quiver.Hom X‚úù Y‚úù
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory.tensorObj F G).map f) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorHom (F.map f) (G.map f))
decl:
/-- (An auxiliary definition for `functorCategoryMonoidal`.)
Tensor product of functors `C ‚•§ D`, when `D` is monoidal.
 -/
@[simps]
def tensorObj : C ‚•§ D where
  obj X := F.obj X ‚äó G.obj X
  map f := F.map f ‚äó G.map f

name: CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory.tensorHom_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory D
F G F' G' : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
Œ± : Quiver.Hom F G
Œ≤ : Quiver.Hom F' G'
X : C
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory.tensorHom Œ± Œ≤).app X) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorHom (Œ±.app X) (Œ≤.app X))
decl:
/-- (An auxiliary definition for `functorCategoryMonoidal`.)
Tensor product of natural transformations into `D`, when `D` is monoidal.
-/
@[simps]
def tensorHom : tensorObj F F' ‚ü∂ tensorObj G G' where
  app X := Œ±.app X ‚äó Œ≤.app X
  naturality X Y f := by dsimp; rw [‚Üê tensor_comp, Œ±.naturality, Œ≤.naturality, tensor_comp]

initialProofState:

Œ≤ : Quiver.Hom F' G'
X : C
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory.whiskerLeft F Œ≤).app X) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerLeft (F.obj X) (Œ≤.app X))
decl:
/-- (An auxiliary definition for `functorCategoryMonoidal`.) -/
@[simps]
def whiskerLeft (F) (Œ≤ : F' ‚ü∂ G') : tensorObj F F' ‚ü∂ tensorObj F G' where
  app X := F.obj X ‚óÅ Œ≤.app X
  naturality X Y f := by
    simp only [‚Üê id_tensorHom]
    apply (tensorHom (ùüô F) Œ≤).naturality
